attributes.additional_details:
Bonfires create excessive smoke which has an impact on the quality of air for the community. Everyone is entitled to fresh air, particularly in their own garden, and especially during the Covid-19 pandemic. Bonfires cause breathing difficulties and this is particularly dangerous for anyone suffering with Covid-19 symptoms, asthma and all babies and children.
It is also a strain on our emergency services when fires get out of control, and a strain on the environment when clothes need rewashing.
attributes.background: Ban any bonfires from occurring before dusk
